author: Daniel R. DePetris
title: The Afghan Air Force Gets More Money Than Infectious Disease Prevention
description: The coronavirus has exposed an awful crisis of priorities: we fund overseas wars before domestic health. The post The Afghan Air Force Gets More Money Than Infectious Disease Prevention appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: The coronavirus has exposed an awful crisis of priorities: we fund overseas wars before domestic health.There are certain moments in history that are so disastrous that they force a nation to think long and hard about its priorities. What truly matters to the… [+6544 chars]
